scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a nude male figure, with fair hair and a loincloth, walking across a grassy field dotted with small red and white flowers. He carries a large amphora on his left shoulder, from which water appears to be pouring out. The background is a deep blue, representing the night sky, with scattered stars and a radiant sun on the left, casting golden rays. The entire scene is framed within an ornate, quatrefoil-shaped border with gold leaf decoration.
